name: The Little Tales Of Alexandria: Mr Meows Party!
name_original: The Little Tales Of Alexandria: Mr Meows Party!
description:
Description

To celebrate the release of The Little Tales Of Alexandria on cartridge! From insideGadgets https://shop.insidegadgets.com/product/the-little-tales-of-alexandria/  and the OST release on SoundCloud, YouTube. Let me introduce this mini spin off, Mr Meows Party! 

Welcome to the mini spin off all about the music from the original game! Keeping the same retro style, available for Gameboy and the Analogue Pocket!

There’s plenty more to the game! You play as Mr Meow! The main cat from the original game for the first time but this time being able to talk to other cats! And Yes! There is a secret to find, just like in the original!

Introduction

Mr Meow and his fluff ball friends have managed to get a massive stereo system into your apartment, enjoy the tracks and see what your fluffy Friends are up too!

Features

More detailed environments

Interact with the world

Interesting and unique characters

More Cats than ever before!

Super Gameboy support 

Two of the main tracks from the original 

Easter eggs

Big hidden secret (to find)

The Meows

Each cat has their own name and personality, as a cat yourself make sure you talk to them and see what the fluff balls are up too!

Movement and Controls

Interact with the stereo system to choose tracks!

Input

Up, down, left and right for directional walking!

A, for confirm.

B, for back.

Start, for enter

Systems

Download includes for multiple platforms.

Made for the original Gameboy, Forward compatible with Pocket, Light, Colour, Advance, SP and Super Gameboy 1/2!

Supporting flashcards and your favourite emulator or emulation device!

Got a Analogue pocket? Play on there! With the .pocket game file!

File types

Gameboy:

.gb file

Analogue pocket:

.pocket file

(The .gb file is MBC5)

Other Versions

Only MBC5 this time around, as not to confuse people.

If you would like MBC3 or Batteryless versions let me know in the comments!

Tested on original hardware! And complete!

Credits

Running on the latest version of GB studio engine.

And

Me!

Original Game

Get it here!

https://authormre.itch.io/the-little-tales-of-alexandria

Hello there! I’m MrE!

I’m the one man developer of this game!

If you like my game, I would very much appreciate a donation! Through the download button. 

Originally set the default to 0.50 but the lowest it will allow is 1.00.

Social media and contact info

-Please Note- This Game only includes the main two tracks from the original, music wise and is intended to be just a bit of fun. Don’t forget to find that secret though!
